name: Hunting Grounds (CARL FARRA!!)
description:
[student project from 2016]

A fight to the death between two people in the woods, inspired by The Revenant. Use your bow or your knife to take your opponent down in this violent standoff.

Controls (PS4 Controllers):
L1 - Charge Bow
R1 - Shoot Arrow / Swing Knife
L2 - Roll
R2 - Change Weapon

The art for the characters is from Titan Souls. The rest is from various sources and is not mine.
